items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dress
items.body: The quality & comfort is nice. The style is great with slit up the side. If you are looking for a slightly snugger fit I would go down a size. 5'6 135 large fits, but a medium would work as well Read more
items.author: Blue dog

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: This dress is a really nice material. Itâ€™s thick but it too thick that it wi make you got. It has pockets on each side. Itâ€™s a fun summer style dress that would be a comfortable item to throw on the day or at the beach. Could also be dressed up a bit with different shoes and handbag. On me, it fits a bit big. I ordered a size small In black. It seems a bit bigger than a normal size small but maybe thatâ€™s the style of this particular dress. I think itâ€™s well made, doesnâ€™t look and isnâ€™t made cheap and itâ€™s a good buy. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice looking
items.body: It fits perfectly and is very comfortable. And pockets! Read more

items.body: Material is soft comfortable wrinkle free lightweight. Love it! I bought another design too.â¤ï¸ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
items.body: I love this dress! The colors are so pretty, and the material is very soft. Read more
items.author: M Schroed

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pockets!! But not flattering on all body types
items.body: I love maxi dresses, and the pattern on this one was so fun and tropical. The fabric is soft and feels like a high quality, and the material is also a little stretchy. There are pockets, which is great! But for me, they sit right on my hips, and the extra fabric there makes the dress shape unflattering on me. It's also a little looser in the waist, and because of the way it hangs on my body, it makes me look more rectangle-shaped than hourglass-shaped. If I were to size down I'm afraid the pockets would be even higher up and the dress wouldn't be long enough for me anymore. I think this would be great on someone who is a little shorter than me (I am 5'7"), but for me it's not a good fit. Read more
items.author: Rey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Satiny soft and comfy.
items.body: By most size charts, I am a medium but I like my clothes roomy so I ordered this in size large. It fits comfortably loosely as I'd expect. A size medium would probably have been fine too, so I'd rate this as fitting true to size. The pattern is called "Romantic Pink Floral" but I'd consider this more of a paisley print. The fabric is a satiny light weight material. For me, the arm holes hang a bit low, but again I ordered a size larger than indicated. The length is just to the top of my feet; I'd expect a size medium to fall just to the ankle as shown in the listing photos. And lest I neglect to mention the nice deep pockets! Overall, I'm thrilled with this dress and can't wait for the warmer weather to wear it outside. Until then, it's one of my "go to" items to wear at home to lounge and entertain in. .. Read more
items.author: Bunnies & Bees

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality not cheap material
items.body: Yes, nice quality of dress. I can't wait to wear it on vacation Read more
items.author: Pete Eikenberry

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 07-army Green, 07-lake, 03-floral Blue Orange, 04- Boho Burnt Orange, 08-floral Boho, 05-romantic Pink Floral, 07-navy Blue, 07-khaki, 05-romantic Blue Ethnic Floral, 08-floral Green Boho, 07-hot Pink, 01-black, 06-tie Dy Rainbow, 08-floral Red Flowers. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
